name: 2048 Number Saga
description:
Classic number matching puzzle game that is fun and challenging. Swipe up, down, left and right to move all tiles. Each swipe creates a new tile in an empty space. When two tiles of the same number touch they combine to create a new number. The game ends when you have no more moves. You win when you join two numbers that create the 2048 tile. After you reach the 2048 tile you can continue to play for high score.

+ Classic Wood Style
+ Swipes Work On Whole Screen Area
+ Get To The 2048 Tile
+ Play For High Score
+ Fun And Addictive
